text:
RELIGION

Yagoda Satsanga Dhyana Kendra: Satsanga on Teachings of Paramahamsa Yogananda, Kendra premises, 9 a.m.

Raj Vidya Kender: Discourse, Inner Peace, Ardra Hall, Huzur Road, 11 a.m.

Committee of Organisers: Sri Madhva Navarathri Mahotsavam, Sri Raghavendra Swamy Brindhavanam, Sullivan Street, 6 p.m.

CULTURE

Amrithavarshini Fine Arts: Carnatic vocal recital, Gayathri Venkataraghavan, Hotel Midland Residency, Telugupalayam Pirivu, 4.30 p.m.

Kamban Kazhagam: Kamban Vizha, Mani High School, 11 a.m.

GENERAL

Nehru Arts and Science College: Alumni meet, 10 a.m.

Kovai Medical Center and Hospital: Childhood Cancer Day, 10 a.m.

PSG College of Nursing: Conference, ‘Neonatal nurses – champions for survival of neonates’, 10 a.m.

Productivity Council: Oratorical competition for industrial workers, 9.30 a.m.

Sree Narayana Guru College: Alumni meet, 10 a.m.

Swarga Foundation: Save a drop cyclothon, Singanallur Boat Club, 6 a.m.

a1 Chips: Honouring senior citizens, Snack Street, R.S. Puram, 6 p.m.

Sri Ramakrishna Engineering College: Guest lecture, 10 a.m.

Hindusthan College of Arts and Science: Cultural fest, Hilaricas, 9.30 a.m.
title: Coimbatore today
